short_description: avane cloud kitchens son is a fast food restaurant based in kadıköy, turkey.
long_description: avane; paket servis modelini yeniden tasarlamak üzere tam yetkin bulut mutfaklar kuran, kendi markalarını geliştiren ve bunları yaparken teknolojiyi tüm operasyonlarının merkezinde tutan bir türk gıda teknolojisi girişimidir. located in ataşehir, i̇stanbul. located in çiğli, i̇zmir. the bowl, gurra tavuk döner, tabur köfte, detroit bad boys pizza, seez beez falafel. souffle d'elice, kale arkası mutfak. located in etiler, i̇stanbul. global expansion started with the first cloud kitchen in london. located in beşiktaş, i̇stanbul. franchise applications with innovative investment models started. founded in 2021, avane cloud kitchens is the first and fastest growing cloud kitchen startup in turkey. biz kimiz? 2021 yılında kurulan avane cloud kitchens, türkiye'deki ilk ve en hızlı büyüyen bulut mutfak girişimidir. with its take-away and take-away oriented business model, it operates virtual restaurants created by itself on all leading food ordering platforms in turkey. paket servis ve gel-al odaklı iş modeliyle türkiye'nin önde gelen tüm yemek sipariş platformlarında kendi oluşturduğu sanal restoranları işletmektedir.

generated_description: avane cloud kitchens is a cloud kitchen company based in kadıköy, istanbul, turkey. founded in 2021, it is the first and fastest-growing cloud kitchen in turkey. the company operates virtual restaurants on leading food ordering platforms, offering both dine-in and take-out options. avane cloud kitchens designs all aspects of their virtual brands, including logos, menus, production, delivery, and customer relationship management. in 2023, the company introduced a hybrid cloud kitchen model that combines dine-in and digital ordering, providing customers with a fast-food experience. this model allows for efficient operation and cost savings, enabling the company to offer high-quality products at affordable prices. avane cloud kitchens has expanded its portfolio to include multiple brands, leveraging shared resources and equipment to optimize operations and brand efficiency.
